name: Data science transcript
body:
## Goal ##

This is my document inspired from <http://datasciencemasters.org>

## My Background ##


## Projects ##

- Allstate Purchase Prediction Challenge [@Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/c/allstate-purchase-prediction-challenge)

- Coursera Data Science Specialization project

## Transcript ##

### Machine Learning ###

- Statistical Learning [@Stanford](https://class.stanford.edu/courses/HumanitiesScience/StatLearning/Winter2014/about)
    - [Official Certificate](http://goo.gl/2zmUZ2)
    - An Introduction to Statistical Learning [Book](http://www-bcf.usc.edu/~gareth/ISL/)
- Programming Collective Intelligence [Book](http://shop.oreilly.com/product/9780596529321.do)
- The Elements of Statistical Learning [Book](http://statweb.stanford.edu/~tibs/ElemStatLearn/)

### Algorithm ###
- Algorithms: Design and Analysis, Part 1 [@Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/course/algo)
- Algorithms: Design and Analysis, Part 2 [@Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/course/algo2)

### Database ###

- Introduction to Databases [@Stanford](https://class.stanford.edu/courses/Engineering/db/2014_1/info)
    - en progress
- MongoDB

### Data Mining ###
- Mining Massive Data Sets [Book](http://i.stanford.edu/%7Eullman/mmds.html)

### Big Data ###
- Hadoop, Hive, Pig

### Coursera Data Science Specialization ###
